# n8n_workflow_activation (Resource)

Manages the activation state of an n8n workflow. This resource controls whether a workflow is active (running) or inactive. Workflows must have at least one trigger node to be activated.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "n8n_workflow_activation" "example" {
  workflow_id = n8n_workflow.example.id
  active      = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `active` (Boolean) Whether the workflow should be active. Note: Workflows must have at least one trigger, poller, or webhook node to be activated.
- `workflow_id` (String) The ID of the workflow to manage activation for

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Internal identifier (same as workflow_id)
